channel.title: Please Help [READ]
channel.description:
Ok, i got registerd with no-ip. I put a no-ip in with port 43594 and my ip and the no-ip thing is godscapepkz.no-ip.biz
How should i connect to my server?
It says: godscapepkz.no-ip.biz: DNS is current, no update needed.
Says on the website under Hosts:
godscapepkz.no-ip.biz My.ip.adress:43594 modify,remove, stats
When i put my mouse over the No ip thing at the toolbar at the botem, it says: No-Ip DUC v2.2.1: my.ip.adress
Please someone help
*Note: Im brand new and I belive this is the spot to ask for help. I see many people with no-ip's and i realy want some help here!
<Making video of this to show you S00N>

item.title: Please Help [READ]
item.dc:creator: @KingOfHeaven KingOfHeaven
